doc.title: Silvio Berlusconi resigns as Italian prime minister – in pictures
doc.author: Share
doc.description: Thousands of Italians celebrate in the streets of Rome after Silvio Berlusconi hands in his resignation as PM at the presidential palace

main.head: Silvio Berlusconi resigns as Italian prime minister – in pictures
main.p: Thousands of Italians celebrate in the streets of Rome after Silvio Berlusconi hands in his resignation at the presidential palace and brings down the curtain on his 17-year domination of Italian politics. His departure followed a historic vote in parliament that paved the way for a new government tasked with shoring up the ailing economy
